campsites.name: Hate One Way
campsites.description: In a world full of HATE, Bart shows that all you need is STOP hatin' & start lovin'!

campsites.name: Aerial Attack
campsites.description: An aeriel attack of emotion & pain describes what is really going on inside Bart's mind.

campsites.name: Rabbit Hole
campsites.description: Find yourself at 2am gazing down this rabbit hole of drama and thrills

campsites.name: Yin & Yang
campsites.description: There are two sides to every story.

campsites.name: River Amoeba
campsites.description: Swimming through a beautiful flowing river of dangers and uncertainity.

campsites.name: Sea Scrap
campsites.description: A beautiful collection of found ocean debris.

campsites.name: Pittsburgh N'At
campsites.description: A collection of vintage Pittsburgh brewed beers.

campsites.name: I Can Taste My Heart Breath
campsites.description: A wild display of twists and turns!

campsites.name: Triangle of Death
campsites.description: You can look! But you can't touch.

campsites.name: Red River
campsites.description: No matter how you look at it, it's a different experience everytime.

campsites.name: Heart Lock
campsites.description: Grinding away at your love. You just can't stop.

campsites.name: Choose Your Fate
campsites.description: Every decision in life has consequences.

comments.text: You can tell the amount of passion he puts into his work!
comments.author: Tinus Lorvaldes

comments.text: The canvas was beautiful, but I can't seem to fit it anywhere in my house!
comments.author: Brennen Ech

comments.text: Absolutely in love with all of his work. Such a down to earth gentlemen as well!
comments.author: McKenzie Sebastian

comments.text: A wonderful collection of pieces he has. Will definitely be coming to his next show!
comments.author: Jordan Runn

comments.text: The Hate One Way piece is my favorite!
comments.author: Ann Dabramov

comments.text: This one was beautiful, it really caught my eye.
comments.author: Brennen Ech

comments.text: So much emotion in this piece. Makes me feel some type of way.
comments.author: McKenzie Sebastian

comments.text: This one is all over the place. I do not like.
comments.author: Jordan Runn

comments.text: Don't listen to Jordan! Keep making beautiful work!
comments.author: Ann Dabramov

comments.text: What a magnificent piece!
comments.author: Tinus Lorvaldes

comments.text: I was starstruck when I met Dan Bart!
comments.author: McKenzie Sebastian

comments.text: The attention to detail in this piece is fantastic.
comments.author: Jordan Runn

comments.text: This one is going right above my headboard!
comments.author: Ann Dabramov

comments.text: Definitely worth the price when you consider all pf the hard work and focus!
comments.author: Tinus Lorvaldes

comments.text: I want to have a paint party with the man himself!.
comments.author: Brennen Ech

comments.text: Such a solid piece with a wonderful story.
comments.author: Jordan Runn

comments.text: It even glows in the dark! I think.
comments.author: Ann Dabramov

comments.text: Got this for my mom on mother's day!
comments.author: Tinus Lorvaldes

comments.text: I see heaven and hell in this piece. It perfectly shows the highs and lows of life.
comments.author: Brennen Ech

comments.text: I will be a lifetime customer.
comments.author: McKenzie Sebastian
Jaime Gerst
comments.text: LOVE this!

comments.author: Nick Marofsky
comments.text: stop hate, spread love! ü§üüèº

comments.author: Lynard Skynard
comments.text: I used to play the triangle back in the band!

partners.name: Valspar Paint
partners.description: Valspar Paint supplies you with the best paint at prices you can't beat.

partners.name: Cape Water Tours and Taxi
partners.description: More Than Just a Boat Ride. Whether this is your first or 500th visit to the Delaware beaches, you will never have a better view of the uniqueness of the southern Delaware waterways than the view you get when you are on one of the cruises or tours offered by Cape water tours and taxi.

partners.name: Delaware Humane Association
partners.description: We value matching the right people with the right animals, offering a friendly and welcoming environment, empowering others to care for animals, and being kind, caring, and compassionate.

partners.name: The Blue Moon
partners.description: Looking for a fun, yet sophisticated restaurant run by fascinating people who nourish your appetite - and a whole lot more? Dine in style at the Blue Moon in Rehoboth Beach, where food and theatrics are both center stage.

promotions.name: Painting With A Twist
promotions.description: Book an evening of fun and laughter! Come paint with Dan Bart himself and BYOB!
